Grey Talon: - Improved visual clarity of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Grey Talon|Size=20} Grey Talon's trap armed state
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Charged Shot|Size=20} Charged Shot collision radius reduced by 10%
- Fixed T3 {AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20} Guided Owl not triggering correctly sometimes when the target has Spirit Armor
Bebop: - Fixed Bebop's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb sometimes misfiring
- Improved visibility of AOE around Bebop while casting {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam
- Gun range reduced from 50m to 30m + 2.5m/boon (max of 58m)
- Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
- Base regen increased from 2.5 to 3
- Base Bullet Resist increased from 0% to 10%
- Bullet Resist per boon reduced from 2.5% to 1.6% (same overall bullet resist at max)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20} Hook range reduced from 40m to 35m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20} Hook T2 increased from +25m to +30m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Exploding Uppercut|Size=20} Exploding Uppercut now has a slight angle limitation to prevent straight-up direction
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Exploding Uppercut|Size=20} Exploding Uppercut radius increased from 10m to 14m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Exploding Uppercut|Size=20} Exploding Uppercut T1 increased from -10s Cooldown to -11s
- Fixed hooking through veils sometimes not working
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb radius increased from 10m to 12m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb can now be cast on self using alt cast hotkey
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam T2 reduced from +140 to +100
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam spirit scaling increased from 2.4 to 3.0
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam turn rate improved by 10%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam nearby radius increased from 4.5m to 5m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam nearby damage now does 25% less than the full amount
McGinnis: - Fixed targeting previews that draw a model (like {AbilityIcon|Ability=McGinnis|Size=20} McGinnis's turrets) to update every frame, instead of being fixed at 60hz
- Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turrets now prioritize any heroes McGinnis is shooting at
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Medicinal Specter|Size=20} Medicinal Specter duration Spirit Power scaling increased from 0.09 to 0.12
- Heavy {AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20} Barrage T1 changed to Rockets apply 35% slow
Lash: - Fixed some cases where Lash's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20} Ground Strike would cause your hero to be stuck
- Health per boon increased from 37 to 42
- Base spirit resist increased from 8% to 15%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20} Flog T3 now also reduces Fire Rate by 35%
- Kinetic Carbine no longer affects channels, cast times or things like Lash's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20} Death Slam
Abrams: - Improved Abrams Siphon and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20} Seismic Impact visuals to not obstruct player view as much
- Remastered Abrams, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pocket|Size=20} Pocket, and Dynamo weapon fire sounds
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20} Seismic Impact often not dragging enemies in the air along with you when you are slamming down
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20} Shoulder Charge not always placing enemies in front of you
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20} Seismic Impact damage reduced from 175 to 150
Haze: - Updated Haze {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20} Sleep Dagger cast, projectile loop and whizby
- Updated Haze {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb sound
- Removed Haze {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb voice line for everyone except the casting player and spectators

- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20} Sleep Dagger now puts you in a brief drowsy state for 0.25s seconds where you move slowly before falling asleep (you still have the ability to shoot/cast/move/etc during this period)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20} Bullet Dance T1 increased from +6 to +7
Dynamo: - Remastered Abrams, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pocket|Size=20} Pocket, and Dynamo weapon fire sounds
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora can now be canceled by using stamina instead of needing to manually exit first (pre T3)
- Fixed Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse sometimes getting caught on stairs
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity now has a 0.1s cast point
- Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse width increased from 4.5m to 5m
- Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse T3 increased from +115 Damage to +125
Pocket: - Remastered Abrams, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pocket|Size=20} Pocket, and Dynamo weapon fire sounds
- Revised sounds for Pocket {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20} Flying Cloak duration and warp
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20} Barrage now respects line of sight
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20} Barrage amp effect now shows on Pocket
- Base Bullet Resist increased from -15% to 0%
- Base Spirit Resist reduced from 0% to -15%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20} Barrage Amp per stack reduced from 10% to 8%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20} Barrage T3 changed to +5% Amp Per Stack
- Fixed the camera moving too slowly after teleporting with Cloak
Wraith: - Improved {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith tracers to feel more connected to their bullet
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick now has 0.5s cd per cast
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20} Telekinesis T2 duration reduced from +0.75s to +0.5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Full Auto|Size=20} Full Auto T2 changed to Imbues Bullets with +5 Spirit Damage (only affects Wraith)
- Fixed being able to melee and parry while stunned by Wraith's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20} Telekinesis
Lady Geist: - Improved effects around Lady Geist {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange to help with clarity
Infernus: - Updated {AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernus|Size=20} Infernus tracer, muzzle, and impact fx revisions for better performance
Vindicta: - Added a sound for movement being restricted by {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slowing Hex|Size=20} Slowing Hex and Vindicta tether
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20} Stake base duration reduced from 2.5s to 2.25s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20} Stake T1 duration reduced from 1s to 0.75s
Ivy: - Fixed melee still going through when casting {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stone Form|Size=20} Stone Form after initiating a melee attack
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stone Form|Size=20} Stone Form T2 stun reduced from 0.75s to 0.5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Watcher's Covenant|Size=20} Watcher's Covenant T1 reduced from +15% Fire Rate to +10%

- Now has a new ultimate ability, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Air Drop|Size=20} Air Drop. Take flight with an Ally (or self-cast to carry a bomb). You fly and drop the ally or bomb onto an area, dealing damage, slowing, and silencing enemies. Ivy and the ally gain a bullet shield when they are dropped. Allies can drop by themselves at any time. When using the ability without an ally (carrying a bomb), it has a 1 second cast time.
Kelvin: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam no longer applies a Disarm
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam now slows Fire Rate (same values as slow)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam max slow reduced from 90% to 60%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam time to reach max slow increased from 1.2s to 2s
- Frozen Shelter can now be cast while using {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam
Mo & Krill: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20} Scorn T3 now affects all damage types
Paradox: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine projectile size reduced by 10%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine cooldown increased from 24s to 28s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine speed duration reduced from 4s to 3.5s
- Kinetic Carbine no longer affects channels, cast times or things like Lash's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20} Death Slam
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine T1 reduced from +0.75s Max Stop duration to +0.5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine T2 cd reduction increased from -8s to -10s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20} Time Wall T3 silence duration reduced from 3.5s to 3s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Paradoxical Swap|Size=20} Paradoxical Swap projectile size reduced by 10%
Seven: - Fixed multiple instances of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge not working correctly
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20} Lightning Ball duration increased from 4s to 5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge stun delay reduced from 4s to 3.5s
Viscous: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Splatter|Size=20} Splatter direct hits counting as the second hit
- Fix Damage prevention after being hit by Viscous' {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball being reduced by Debuff Reducer
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=The Cube|Size=20} The Cube cast range increased from 25m to 30m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=The Cube|Size=20} The Cube T2 cooldown reduced from -25s to -22s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20} Puddle Punch now deals light melee damage and is affected by melee items
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20} Puddle Punch Charge Delay increased from 0.5s to 1.5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball duration reduced from 12s to 10s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball T1 duration reduced from +6s to +5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball cooldown increased from 80s to 90s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball now deals 50% damage to bosses
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball spirit resist reduced from 80% to 70%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball bullet resist reduced from 70% to 60%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball can now only stun and damage a target once every 1.5s, up from once every 1.0s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball acceleration lowered a bit
- Stunning or immobilizing {AbilityIcon|Ability=Viscous|Size=20} Viscous now stops the ball from moving, and prevents him from doing damage and stunning
Warden: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word no longer drains 1 stamina
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask T2 changed from -10s Cooldown to Drains 1 Stamina
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask T3 now also reduces cooldown by -7s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word immobilize duration reduced from 2s to 1.75
- Binding Word now has a quick cast behavior (same as {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge)
Yamato: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike T3 now procs after the ability ends, rather than when connecting to the target

Ricochet: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ricochet|Size=20} Ricochet sometimes shooting the extra bullet from your gun rather than the target
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate increased from +8% to +12%
Smoke: - Updated Haze {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb sound
- Removed Haze {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb voice line for everyone except the casting player and spectators
Slowing Hex: - Added a sound for movement being restricted by {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slowing Hex|Size=20} Slowing Hex and Vindicta tether
- Debuff no longer cancels active mobility spells, it only prevents them from being casted
- Now also reduces stamina distance by 30%
Torment Pulse: - Weakened Patron now has a Torment {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse style effect, hitting up to 2 enemies in the pit for 75 damage per second
Monster Rounds: - Now grants +30% Bullet Resistance vs NPCs
Active Reload: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate reduced from 24% to 20%
Fire Rate: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate reduced from 24% to 20%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ricochet|Size=20} Ricochet: Fire Rate increased from +8% to +12%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Superior Stamina|Size=20} Superior Stamina: Fire Rate reduced from 10% to 7%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Withering Whip|Size=20} Withering Whip: Now applies -40% Fire Rate instead of a Disarm
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ethereal Shift|Size=20} Ethereal Shift: No longer provides +10% Fire Rate
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mystic Slow|Size=20} Mystic Slow: Fire Rate reduction increased from -30% to -40%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Watcher's Covenant|Size=20} Watcher's Covenant T1 reduced from +15% Fire Rate to +10%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam now slows Fire Rate (same values as slow)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20} Flog T3 now also reduces Fire Rate by 35%
Berserker: - Fixed gaining stacks much faster than intended when taking damage from troopers
Warp Stone: - Active Bullet Resist reduced from +60% to +40%
Bullet Armor: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Point Blank|Size=20} Point Blank: Now grants +15% Bullet Armor
Escalating Resilience: - Max Bullet Resist increased from 30% to 36%
Intensifying Magazine: - Time for Max Damage reduced from 3.5s to 3s (this is a buff)
Siphon Bullets: - You permanently steal 1 stack (45 HP) from the enemy if they die under the debuff. If an enemy you stole a stack from kills you, they regain 1 stack back.
Glass Cannon: - No longer gives +2 ammo on kill
- Now gives +10% Weapon Damage per kill (up to +50%)
- When you die you lose a stack
Melee Lifesteal: - Heal effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 25% to 35%
Restorative Locket: - Heal per stack increased from 30 to 40
Combat Barrier: - Weapon Damage While Shielded increased from +24% to +28%
Enchanter's Barrier: - Spirit Power while Shielded increased from +17 to +20
Superior Stamina: - Air Jump/Dash Distance reduced from +50% to +40%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate reduced from 10% to 7%
Lifestrike: - Heal effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 25% to 35%
- Heal increased from 45% of melee damage to +55%
Fortitude: - Out of combat regen timer reduced from 13s to 12s
Rebirth: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Rebirth Health increased from 40% to 50%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Cooldown reduced from 240s to 200s
Spirit Strike: - Debuff increased from -10% Spirit Resist to -12%
Ammo Scavenger: - Spirit Power Duration increased from 24s to 35s
Cold Front: - Damage Spirit Power scaling increased from 1.25 to 1.5
Withering Whip: - Now applies -40% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate instead of a Disarm
Quicksilver Reload: - Infused ability bonus damage increased from +30 to +50
Ethereal Shift: - No longer provides +10% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate
Mystic Slow: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate reduction increased from -30% to -40%
Superior Cooldown: - Non-Imbued ability cd reduction increased from 22% to 24%
Magic Carpet: - Added a new T4 Spirit item, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Magic Carpet|Size=20} Magic Carpet: Active - After a 1.3s delay, a magic carpet arrives to pick you up. You gain full flight controls and have +6 m/s movement speed. Lasts 7 seconds. If you cast abilities or use your gun, the carpet disappears. While on the {AbilityIcon|Ability=Magic Carpet|Size=20} Magic Carpet you gain +400 Bullet and +400 Spirit Shields. Passively grants +150 Health, +10% Ability Duration, and +15 Spirit Power. Cooldown: 40s
Spirit Armor: - Fixed T3 {AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20} Guided Owl not triggering correctly sometimes when the target has Spirit Armor
Debuff Reducer: - Fix Damage prevention after being hit by Viscous' {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball being reduced by Debuff Reducer

Splatter: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Splatter|Size=20} Splatter direct hits counting as the second hit
Goo Ball: - Fix Damage prevention after being hit by Viscous' {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball being reduced by Debuff Reducer
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball duration reduced from 12s to 10s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball T1 duration reduced from +6s to +5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball cooldown increased from 80s to 90s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball now deals 50% damage to bosses
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball spirit resist reduced from 80% to 70%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball bullet resist reduced from 70% to 60%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball can now only stun and damage a target once every 1.5s, up from once every 1.0s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball acceleration lowered a bit
The Cube: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=The Cube|Size=20} The Cube cast range increased from 25m to 30m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=The Cube|Size=20} The Cube T2 cooldown reduced from -25s to -22s
Puddle Punch: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20} Puddle Punch now deals light melee damage and is affected by melee items
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20} Puddle Punch Charge Delay increased from 0.5s to 1.5s
Binding Word: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word no longer drains 1 stamina
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word immobilize duration reduced from 2s to 1.75
- Binding Word now has a quick cast behavior (same as {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge)
Alchemical Flask: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask T2 changed from -10s Cooldown to Drains 1 Stamina
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask T3 now also reduces cooldown by -7s
Card Trick: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick now has 0.5s cd per cast
Telekinesis: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20} Telekinesis T2 duration reduced from +0.75s to +0.5s
- Fixed being able to melee and parry while stunned by Wraith's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20} Telekinesis
Full Auto: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Full Auto|Size=20} Full Auto T2 changed to Imbues Bullets with +5 Spirit Damage (only affects Wraith)
Flying Strike: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike T3 now procs after the ability ends, rather than when connecting to the target

General: - Games can now be watched by an unlimited number of spectators
- Spectator games now have 1 minute delay
- Added localization for Simplified Chinese, Russian, Brazilian Portuguese, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Latin America), Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, and French. These are currently a work-in-progress.
- Language can be selected from the settings menu
- Matchmaking windows are now open 1 hour earlier in all regions
- You can now prioritize your roster into three groups to indicate your preference ordering to the matchmaker: Selected, Priority, High Priority
- Added customization options for your crosshair
- Builds: You can now author a suggested ordering of Ability Upgrades
- Builds: You can now add per-item author comments by right clicking on items while editing builds that will show up in the item tooltip for users of the build
- Fixed a bug that allowed published build data to overwrite local changes to a published build
- Fixed a bug that prevented the last used hero build from loading when it was not a favorited build
- Hovering items in the shop will now highlight their components, or which item they are components of
- Reworked the Hero Stats UI in the shop
- Hero Stats in the shop have been expanded and are now broken up by Weapon, Vitality, and Spirit. Various additional stats that were previously hidden have been added here.
- Individual stats can now be hovered over to see a breakdown of all the bonuses contributing to a value, including things like golden statues
- Added descriptive gun information to each hero
- Added Spirit Power Impact panel that displays the effect of Spirit Power on your Abilities and Items
- Added Outgoing Damage as a UI display mode that you can toggle through
- Added a setting to let you customize the ability cancel hotkey (default is spacebar)
- Added a "Friends Only" checkbox to filter the watch tab
- Added an option to control zoom sensitivity
- Fixed Candle Troopers sometimes instantly disappearing on death rather than going into their death flash state
- Using an active item or ability removes the undo option for the item/AP
- Fixed some abuse cases with undoing AP cooldown reductions
- Added a video setting to reduce flashing effects
- Unpause hotkey is now displayed when the game is paused
- Pause cooldown per player increased from 10 minutes to 15 minutes
- Replaced the Urn drop parachute with new effects
- Fixed some cases where the comeback souls would be higher than intended in the early game
- Fixed being unable to ping while dead
- Improved smoothing of spectator camera position and angles
- Fixed a bug that allowed teleporters to be used while carrying the Soul Urn
- Fixed stuns resetting their duration if you were on the ground and became airborne
- Fixed ESC not working to close Settings popup sometimes
- Various visual adjustments on highlight and strobe effects being too loud in some cases
- Added popup to bot games to indicate that they tend to be much longer games than normal ones
- Added new Silence status effect sound
- Updated bullet whizby sounds for nearly all characters
- Fixed some spectator/replay sound and music bugs
- Various sound related performance improvements
- More impactful damage indication sound for attackers
- Improved lighting performance around shop
- Fixed Mimic options in sandbox not working properly
- Added alternate shop music
- Teleporter activation no longer gets canceled on incoming damage.
- Teleporter channel time increased from 4s to 5s
- Walkers now require you to be within 30m to deal damage to them
- Walker Health increased by 15%
- Base Guardian Health increased by 20%
- Patron damage increased by 30% after it is vulnerable
- Weakened Patron Health increased by 15%
- You can now use melee hotkey while zoomed to exit zoom and perform a melee
bounce_pad_locations.jpg
- Added one-way defender exits beside each outer lane entrance
- Added Speed Boost Volumes in the defender passages on the outsides of the base
base_speed_boost.jpg
- Firehouse (building next to Sapphire Yellow Guardian) has been reworked to match the layout of the Chapel
- Low roof buildings beside Amber Purple Guardian and Sapphire Yellow Guardian are now valid play spaces
- Removed zap triggers
- Added truck on the back side of those buildings to allow climbing up
- Removed rooftop props for those buildings
- Added billboards to the edge closest to the lane
- Low roof buildings between inner lane Walker arenas are now valid play spaces
- Removed zap triggers
- Expanded rooftop size
- Added fire escape stairs to allow access from the upper level from the Mid
rooftop_locations_large.jpg
- Walker Arena - Amber Yellow/Sapphire Purple:
- Added catwalks from high ground defender area to building across the street
- Added passage through building and stairs up to a peek spot toward the Guardian
- Replaced upper floor juke spot with a connection through building across from new peek spot
amber_yellow_walker_arena.jpg
- Walker Arena - Amber Orange/Sapphire Blue:
- Added catwalk from the low roof building to the building across the street
- Replaced juke spot in the courtyard with passage connecting to the new catwalk
- Widened hallway above Underground Shop
- Removed railing and added stairs in the passage toward the Guardian
- Courtyard floor opening to the Underground Shop moved closer to above the shop
amber_orange_walker_arena.jpg
- Walker Arena - Amber Blue/Sapphire Orange:
- Added a juke spot inside the Police Station/Garment Building
- Added a juke spot down the stairs from the Guardian to the left
amber_blue_walker_arena.jpg
- Walker Arena - Amber Purple/Sapphire Yellow:
- Added an interior corridor through the building between the base and the Walker
- Added a balcony that borders the arena on the back side of the Walker
amber_purple_walker_arena.jpg
- Added a new T1 Weapon item. Grants +35% Bullet Projectile Speed, +14% Weapon Damage and +50 Bullet Shield.
